mapper.select:
select
from sys_transaction where 1 = 1
and (merchantName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or agentSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or terminalNum like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or transCardNum like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER BY id
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

and (merchantName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or agentSerialNo like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or terminalNum like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or transCardNum like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
